div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 185 Peloponnesus?, before 1924 Burial: c. 220-215 B.C. Contents: 5 AR Alexander III: 5 late post. tetradr. (Sicyon 2 ANS 1944.100.29664 ANS 1944.100.29671, Megalopolis 1 ANS 1944.100.29694, unc. Pelop. 2 ANS 1944.100.29716 ANS 1944.100.29717) Disposition: New York Troxell, ANSMN 17 (1971), pp. 53, 55, 84, 92, illus.
